mapper.select: select vPhone from orders where oid=#{oid}

select distinct o.odname,o.odaName,o.odprice ,od.vphone,od.oyprice,od.ocprice,od.oprice,od.payment,od.odesk,o.odoid,o.odid
,s.vBalance,s.vname,s.vCount,s.vGrade,s.vDiscount,s.vDisplay,s.vid,s.vAcount
from orderdetails o inner join area a on o.odaid=a.aId inner join orders od on od.oid=o.odoid
inner join (select v.vidc,v.vphone,v.vAcount,v.vid,vb.vBalance,v.vname,v.vCount,vt.vGrade,vt.vDiscount,vt.vDisplay from vip v inner join vbills vb on v.vidc = vb.vidc inner join vtype vt on v.vidc=vt.vidc ) s on s.vPhone = od.vPhone
where o.odoId=#{oid}

mapper.update: update orders set ocPrice=#{oprice} where oid=#{id}

update orders o inner join (select distinct od.odName,od.odPrice,od.odnum,o.vPhone, o.oPrice,o.oyPrice,o.ocPrice,s.vdiscount,s.vname,o.oid from orderdetails od inner join orders o on od.odoid=o.oid inner join (select v.vid,v.vname,vy.vdiscount,v.vphone from vip v inner join vtype vy on v.vidc = vy.vidc) s on o.vphone=s.vphone where o.oid =#{id}) c on o.oid = c.oid set o.oyPrice = c.ocPrice-(c.ocPrice*c.vdiscount),o.oPrice=o.ocPrice*c.vdiscount
